SampleCharm.title: Sample Charm
SampleCharm.desc: This Charm is fxkin wild boi

ProteinPills.title: Protein Pills
ProteinPills.desc: Gain a 2-turn buff that increases the damage you deal and reduces the damage you take by 15%.

Leeches.title: Leeches!
Leeches.desc: Gain a buff this turn that heals you for 20% of all damage you deal.

Molotov.desc: Deal 30 damage to your opponent and inflict Burning on all tiles in a small area. Discard 1 random hex.

FiveAlarmBell.title: Five-Alarm Bell
FiveAlarmBell.desc: Locked: Charm: Drag target 5 tiles and inflict them with Burning and deal 50 damage. Key: Inflict Burning on 8 or more tiles this turn.

HRForm.title: HR Form
HRForm.desc: Zombify all Muscle tiles in a small area.

PartySnacks.title: Party Snacks
PartySnacks.desc: Target Zombie explodes, destroying itself and 2 random adjacent tiles, and dealing 60-80 damage.

Bandages.desc: Heal yourself for 60-80 health and gain a stacking 2-turn buff that reduces the damage you take by 10%.

WaterLily.title: Water Lily
WaterLily.desc: Add 4 Water tiles into the board in random columns.

DanceShoes.title: Dance Shoes
DanceShoes.desc: Perform a swap. Inflict Burning on both tiles swapped.

BurningBracers.title: Burning Bracers
BurningBracers.desc: Gain 1 AP. Has Quickdraw if more than 9 tiles are burning.
